title: Pecan and sweet potato pie
ingredients: ['450g sweet potatoes', '60g butter, melted', '1 (397g) tin sweetened condensed milk', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 pinch of salt', '1 egg', '1 (23cm) shortcrust pastry case', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 tablespoon butter, melted', '125g chopped pecans']
